text: An election to Donegal County Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 29 councillors were elected from six electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for a five-year term of office. ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|11 | align=right|- | align=right|20,636 | align=right|36.20% | align=right| |- | align=right|9 | align=right|- | align=right|14,096 | align=right|24.72% | align=right| |- | align=right|4 | align=right|-1 | align=right|11,760 | align=right|20.63% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|-1 | align=right|2,605 | align=right|4.57% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|- | align=right|1,427 | align=right|2.5% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|+1 | align=right|1,317 | align=right|2.31% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|+1 | align=right|4,792 | align=right|8.41% | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |29 | align=center|- | align=right |57,013 | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== * Sitting in italics ===Buncrana=== ===Donegal=== ===Glenties=== ===Letterkenny=== ===Milford=== ==External links== *Official website *Irishelectionliterature Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Donegal County Council election
